Ingredients.2: 1  butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cut into chunks

Ingredients.3: 1  sweet potato, peeled and cut into chunks

Ingredients.7: 2 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste

Ingredients.8: 4 cups chicken stock, or as needed

Ingredients.10: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Melt butter in a large pot over medium-high heat. Cook and stir butternut squash, sweet potato, carrot, celery, onion, and garlic in hot butter until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.

Directions.2: Pour chicken stock and sweet bell peppers into butternut squash mixture; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until squash and potato are tender, about 40 minutes.

Directions.3: Pour squash mixture into a blender no more than half full. Cover and hold lid down; pulse a few times before leaving on to blend. Puree in batches until smooth.

Directions.4: Return pureed soup to pot and season with salt and black pepper.
